dan shishyathwaya yanu lamunge sellamak nowa ammalage thaththalage sellamaki.anek wibhagada esemaya.panthi yanne nathnam wibhaga samathwiya nohaki yayi dadi mathayak lamun menma demapiyan atharada atha.ma samanya pela wibhagaya mulinma liwwe me dedas ganan walaya.ehidi ingrisi walata hondin panthi giyamuth ganithaya saha widyawata panthi giye panthi ya yuthu yayi awata siti un ki nisamaya.awasana mata ganithayata sammanayak pamani labune.ee ganithayata labunu sochcham risalt eken usas pela ganithaya karannata dunne mage pasale athi hondakama nisaya.ma pasal giya kalada buddhagamata pawa panthi giya lamo wuha.ee samaharak ge risalt ma tharam wath honda natha.samara ayata hatha wasare sita 11 wasara dakwama sathiye dina hatharak sawasa panthi thibuni.namuth ma nam kisima awulak nathuwa 11 wasara wibhagaya katauda thiyagenath bola gasimata saha noyek poth path kiyawimata wasanawa laddek wiya.ewakata keji karunathilaka mahatha pariwarthanaya kala tasan poth siyallath ethumagema montha kristho situwaraya poth siyallath,drakiyula saha ewaka janapriya wu homs kathandarath ma bohomayak 11wasara wanawita kiyawa thibuni.dan baluwoth ma sarthaka kenekayi nokiyami.ee pasuwa siduwu athwaraddaki.ganitha anshayen sammana samartha 3k labuwek kese wiya yuthu dayi samajaya thiranaya karanu labana ansha walata ma akamathi wime athipanditha gathiya methek wu pasubasmata hethu wiya.eheth usas pela kala pasal guruwarayekgen kemesti wishayata samanya samarthayak labagannata wath bolata nohaki yayi niyatha wiwarana labu ma ee kala gath samartha sambandhayen boho sahimakata pathwiya.
